text:
About 2.19 lakh tree saplings would be planted in the district during the current year, Collector K.S.Palanisamy said. Inaugurating a sapling plantation drive at the Zamindar Higher Secondary School campus at Thuraiyur on Wednesday,Mr.Palanisamy said about 25,800 saplings would be planted by the Department of Forests and another 1.93 lakh saplings would be planted under the Mahatma Gandhi National Employment Guarantee Scheme. About 7.78 lakh saplings have been planted in the district since 2012 in the district, he added.

Workshop

A workshop on legal metrology and rules organised by the Departments of Labour and Consumer Protection began at the BHEL Community centre on Thursday. Experts in legal metrology from Tamil Nadu, Karnataka and New Delhi are participating in the workshop. Labour department officials and representatives of consumer organisations and traders bodies were participating in the training workshop, V.Raja, Joint Commissioner of Labour, Tiruchi, said in a press release.
title: 2.19 lakh saplings to be planted
